entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Broadview
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:42 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Broadview 12:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: -9.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -11.5°C
Wind: ESE 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming east 30 km/h this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023
